title: China Cables
description: China Cables is an investigation into the surveillance and mass internment without charge or trial of Uighurs and other Muslim minorities in Xinjiang.

title: Implant Files
description: Health authorities across the globe have failed to protect millions of patients from poorly tested implants, the first-ever global examination of the medical device industry reveals.

title: Paradise Papers
description: A major global collaboration reveals secrets from one of the worldâ€™s most prestigious offshore law firms, a specialized trust company and 19 company registries in secrecy jurisdictions.

title: Football Tax
description: Football clubs receive millions in public funds. Our team investigated to tell you how much you paid.

title: Rentswatch
description: An inventory of the renting industry in the biggest European cities.

title: Migrants Files
description: An investigation into the human and financial cost of 15 years of Fortress Europe.

title: Kissinger Cables
description: The Kissinger cables are 1.7 million United States diplomatic and intelligence records dating from 1973 to 1976 that WikiLeaks republished in April 2013.

title: Iraq Warlogs
description: The Iraq War documents leak is the disclosure to WikiLeaks of more than 390,000 internal U. S. military field reports, of the Iraq War from 2004 to 2009.

title: Afghan Warlogs
description: The Afghan War documents leak is the disclosure of Wikileaks of more than 75,000 internal U.S. military logs of the War in Afghanistan.
